thread.section_title: Eurocycles Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Eurocycles | eurocycles.com
thread.title: Doreen Duffy

author: Doreen Duffy
title: Doreen Duffy
text:
We were more than happy with the service we received from Eurocycles Long Mile Road, unfortunately we don't have the name of the staff member we dealt with but he was extremely helpful. Also when we could not get through to Long Mile Road by phone due to some phone fault we phoned customer services and Colm Enright was extremely helpful too.
We would have no hesitation in recommending Eurocycles because of this.
